short_summary: Request for Information on Property Management Services in the National Capital Region
description: The Government of Canada has released a Request for Information on Property Management Services in the National Capital Region. This RFI aims to gather industry feedback on documentation related to the upcoming solicitation. Industry participants are invited to review draft documents, indicate areas of required clarification, and barriers to bidding. The following objectives are important to Canada and will be a component of this procurement: Indigenous Participation, Participation of Under Represented Entities, Accessibility and Greening Government.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
**Request for Information (RFI) #2 - Property Management Services in the National Capital Region**

**Reference Number**: WS3945710748-Doc4044573204
**Amendment Number**: 1
**Solicitation Number**: WS3945710748
**Publication Date**: June 7, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: June 30, 2023, at 14:00:00
**Amendment Date**: June 20, 2023

**Title**: Request for Information (RFI) #2 - Property Management Services in the National Capital Region

**Description**: This Request for Information (RFI), RFI #2, is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services to solicit industry feedback on documentation related to the upcoming solicitation for Property Management Services in the National Capital Region.

**Objectives**: The objectives for this procurement include Indigenous Participation, Participation of Underrepresented Entities, Accessibility, and Greening Government.

**Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Open Bidding.

**Selection Criteria**: The selection criteria will be based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

**Note**: This RFI is not a bid solicitation and will not result in the award of a contract or the creation of a source list. Participation in this RFI will not preclude any potential supplier from participating in any future procurement. There will be no financial compensation for industry's participation.

**Contact Information**: For more information, please contact:

Laura Beauchamp, SPAC/PSPC
Email: [laura.beauchamp@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:laura.beauchamp@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16517768?extsite=MTY1MTc3NjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16517768?extsite=MTY1MTc3NjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

I made some significant edits to trim down the content, use clearer headings, and rephrase the text to make it more formal. 
This version still includes all the important information without being too verbose. 
The original text has been extensively rewritten and reviewed to create a clear and concise format. 

Format:
Headers and bullet points are used to improve readability.
